Uses of Class
io.hekate.messaging.loadbalance.LoadBalancerException

  • Packages that use LoadBalancerException 
    Package Description
    io.hekate.messaging.loadbalance
    Load balancer API.

    • Uses of LoadBalancerException in io.hekate.messaging.loadbalance

      Subclasses of LoadBalancerException in io.hekate.messaging.loadbalance 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  EmptyTopologyException
      Signals that there are no suitable cluster nodes to perform load balancing.
      class  UnknownRouteException
      Signals that the node load balanced node couldn't be found in the cluster topology.
      Methods in io.hekate.messaging.loadbalance that throw LoadBalancerException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected ClusterNode DefaultLoadBalancer.affinityRoute(T message, LoadBalancerContext ctx)
      Selects a node based on the partition mapping of the operation's affinity key.
      protected ClusterNode DefaultLoadBalancer.nonAffinityRoute(T message, LoadBalancerContext ctx)
      Selects a random node from the load balancer context.
      ClusterNodeId LoadBalancer.route(T message, LoadBalancerContext ctx)
      Selects one of the cluster nodes from the load balancer context.
      ClusterNodeId DefaultLoadBalancer.route(T message, LoadBalancerContext ctx)
